Exception exception

Detailed Description

The Java encapsulation of an empty message (typically produced by a timeout event when reading).

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

org::ipdr::protocol::ProtocolMsgEmpty::ProtocolMsgEmpty (  Exception  exception  )  [inline]
 

Create an empty message.

Parameters:
exception The exception that caused this message to be created -- typically a timeout, but can also be null (to indicate no reason).
